name: Coffee Shop Simulator
description:
Current Version 0.1.0

_________________________________________________________

Support the project on Patreon Check out the Discord server.  

Coffee Shop Simulator is a fun game where you’re the owner are trying to be the best coffee shop in the city!

Have fun making hot and cold coffee drinks and serving pastries and bananas to hungry customers using real fluid simulation. Watch out, some of them are critics and those are the ones you want to impress. Upgrade your shop by buying new equipment to make more drinks and replace your old furniture with new ones and to add decorations. The more you upgrade, the more unique and fun critics come into your shop!

Features
  • Serve customers using your drip coffee machine.
  • Real fluid simulation that pours and changes color like real fluid!
  • Buy shop supplies with your computer.
  • Unique critics.
  • Fun low-poly style art work
  • Regular updates.
Patreon

Coffee Shop Simulator is currently in the pre-alpha phase at this time. I’ve been really focused on this game and want to start sharing my journey with everyone. Please come check out my Patreon page and do consider supporting me! More details about my Patreon rewards on my Patreon page linked above.

Have fun playing Coffee Shop Simulator!

Controls

Movement: AWSD

Interact: Left and Right mouse click

Spin Item: Q and E

Turn Item: Z and C
